# destinationFileURL

**Instance Property**

The destination path of the downloaded file.

## Declaration

```swift
var destinationFileURL: URL
```

## Discussion

This URL path needs to include the file name.

## Accessing download request properties

- **cellularServiceID**: The service identifier associated with this request.
- **fileURL**: The URL of the file to download.
